root.mailSubject: Seller Buyer Agreement Id - <%sbrId%> is Approved
root.mailContent:
Dear <%anchorCustomer.customerid%>,

We are here to notify that Your Seller Buyer Agreement Approved with reference:<%sbrId%>. Please use this reference for any further communiation



Please find attached Agreement copy with Counter Parties for product type . Kindly note that the attachments are password protected. To open the attachment, kindly enter your 6 / 8 digit Customer ID. This e-mail is for your information and does not require a response.



If you wish to contact us for any further clarifications, please e-mail us at xxxx or call XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX within UAE or XXXXXXXXXXXXX from outside UAE.



Sincerely,
Customer Business Department
www.OA-ADMIN.com
